title: A minimalist weight lifting log app
author: pattrn
content: plansible welcome plansible, new weight lifting log app.plansible is weight lifting log app designed minimize time spend your phone to maximize time lift. seriously simple.here's you start routine:1. tap "routine"2. tap "leg "3. tap "squats"here's you start one-off exercise:1. tap "exercise"2. tap "legs"3. tap "squats"4. hugehere's you your progress:1. tap "charts"2. bask gloryhere's you share workout:1. tap "share"2. huge gainshere's you download app: * home * * contact * privacy policy *
